criteria: Security code review of authentication and hashing logic completed and signed off; All E2E authentication tests passing; No unhandled exceptions in login flow.
success_metrics: Zero critical security vulnerabilities identified; 100% pass rate on auth tests.

criteria: DirectX POC successfully demonstrated; Technical report for DirectX approved; Session lock/unlock E2E tests passing.
bypass_criteria: Not bypassable. Failure triggers contingency plan.
success_metrics: Go/No-Go decision for DirectX viewer is made; Session lock feature is stable.

criteria: Study load time (<3s for 500MB study) benchmark met; UI responsiveness (>30 FPS) during tool interaction confirmed; Zero memory leaks detected after 10-minute session.
bypass_criteria: Minor deviations acceptable if documented as technical debt.
tools_used: dotTrace, Visual Studio Profiler, Custom benchmark tests
success_metrics: All NFR performance targets for the core viewer are met on recommended hardware.

criteria: Generated GSPS files pass validation against dcmtk or similar tool; Migration analysis document is complete and approved by stakeholders.
bypass_criteria: Not bypassable. Failure triggers contingency plan for annotations.
success_metrics: Annotation feature is confirmed to be interoperable; Migration plan is technically sound.
